author: Mehera Bonner
title: Malia Obama's President's Day Weekend Trip - How Malia Obama Spent President's Day Weekend
text: By Mehera Bonner Feb 22, 2017 Fact: the Obamas are living their best vacation lives now that they're out of the White Houseâ€”and we're not just talking about Barack's new love for backwards ball caps and kite surfing . Malia Obama also recently went on a dream vacation, joining designer Monique Lhuillier and her husband Tom Bugbee on a ski trip in Aspen. A post shared by Monique Lhuillier (@moniquelhuillier) on Feb 20, 2017 at 8:10am PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Obama and Lhuillier hung out with a veritable squad of famous people, including the daughters of New York Giants owner Steve Tisch and Prince Tassilo von Furstenberg. That's right, a casual prince. A post shared by Jamie Alexander Tisch (@jamietisch) on Feb 19, 2017 at 7:24pm PST While Malia is notoriously private, the crew were spotted at the Cloud Nine Alpine Bistro, where the above pics were snapped. We want to go to there. Follow Marie Claire on F acebook for the latest celeb news, beauty tips, fascinating reads, livestream video, and more. More from Marie Claire:
